definition[0]: to speak unclearly without separating your words or sounds correctly
example[1]: She was slurring her words as if she was drunk.
definition[1]: to criticize someone or something unfairly
definition[2]: to play a group of musical notes smoothly together
definition[3]: an unfair criticism that is intended to make people dislike someone or something
example[2]: How dare she cast a slur on  (=criticize) my character?
example[4]: Milton regarded her comment as a slur on his country.
definition[4]: a curved line written over musical notes to show they must be played together smoothly
